sportsYou is a robust, US-owned and operated messaging and media platform built with Coaches to elevate Team Culture.

We provide a data-secure, school-safe environment that promotes accountability and enriches youth sports communities to help young Athletes find their stride –  in sports and life. 

We empower Coaches to contact Athletes and Families in real time without having to share personal emails or phone numbers.

We enable ADs to get a holistic picture of all their teams’ activity, efficiently segment by season, create Captains groups, and more.

We provide Athletes, Parents, and Team Photographers the space to share the magic moments they capture. 
sY is frictionless to set up and we will never sell your data.

Because to us, You aren’t users – You’re Teammates.

CALENDAR brings transparency to all Team activity with the ability to update schedules and share locations through Google Maps.

POSTS let you make announcements, share content, and engage with all.

CHAT enables real-time communication with an entire team or selected groups. 

TEAMS let you huddle up in seconds with unlimited Teammates.

FILES give you a centralized library to store and share important docs.

MEDIA provides a dynamic gallery for all the pics and vids captured of the Team doing their thing.

sportsYou is ready for a tryout.

We’ll be the best Teammate you ever had.

sportsYou Pro – available as an in-app purchase – unlocks premium features that elevate team communication and media management. Enjoy powerful tools like scheduled messaging, advanced calendar capabilities, priority support, and exclusive time-saving features we'll continue adding to enhance your team experience.

The NBA App is your home for the season.

Tap to watch live games and get free, instant access to the latest schedule, scores, highlights, news, and behind the scenes stories from across the National Basketball Association.

In the free NBA App, fans get access to:
- Live scores, stats and standings 
- The latest basketball news, highlights, game previews and recaps.
- The full season schedule and details on where to watch every NBA game*
- Stories from across the NBA to bring you closer to the action.
- Live channels streaming around the clock basketball coverage, highlights, studio shows, and more.
- Personalized live updates on your favorite teams and players
- Live free access to postgame press conferences after every game
- Play free games to test your basketball knowledge with NBA Play

*Fans will be guided to log in or subscribe to the appropriate streaming service including ABC, ESPN, NBC, Peacock, Amazon Prime Video, and NBA League Pass for out-of-market games.

Want even more? Watch live games with NBA League Pass and stream your favorite NBA teams and players.

NBA League Pass subscribers have access to:
- Streaming NBA games live and on-demand.*
- Alternate streams including Data Mode and NBA Hoopervision
- Local language broadcasts
- Overlays with player stats, scores of other games, and live odds without leaving the game
- Mobile optimized game streams for phones and tablets
- Access to stream the reimagined NBA TV
- Access to the NBA archives to stream the most memorable games and moments.

League Pass Premium subscribers get access to:
- Gametime is anytime with download for later to watch NBA games on the go or offline.
- Commercial free viewing on up to 3 devices
- In-Arena Entertainment at game breaks, so you feel like you are there.

** Blackouts and restrictions apply in the US and Canada.

NBA ID has rewards for every fan. Sign up and get access to:
- Member-only benefits like free ticket giveaways and sports merch deals
- Free live game nights and exclusive content
- Daily fan perks during NBA ID Member Days
- Upgraded fan experiences at NBA events
- Voting on top league moments and influence the game
- Earning badges that show off your fandom

Play free games with NBA play to test your basketball knowledge and show how well you know the sport. Games include:
- Full Court Guess
- Hoop Connect
- NBA IQ
- NBA Rank
- Player Path
- NBA Blast
- Trivia

Get the best free NBA coverage, including pre-season games, global games, NBA Emirates NBA Cup, Christmas Day games, NBA All-Star Weekend and All-Star Game, NBA Playoff games, NBA Finals, NBA Draft, NBA Summer League, and NBA 2K League. The official NBA app features highlights of every shot, dunk, nothing but net, and more from the Atlanta Hawks, Boston Celtics, Brooklyn Nets, Charlotte Hornets, Chicago Bulls, Cleveland Cavaliers, Dallas Mavericks, Denver Nuggets, Detroit Pistons, Golden State Warriors, Houston Rockets, Indiana Pacers, LA Clippers, Los Angeles Lakers, Memphis Grizzlies, Miami Heat, Milwaukee Bucks, Minnesota Timberwolves, New Orleans Pelicans, New York Knicks, Oklahoma City Thunder, Orlando Magic, Philadelphia 76ers, Phoenix Suns, Portland Trail Blazers, Sacramento Kings, San Antonio Spurs, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz, and Washington Wizards.

Current NBA League Pass and NBA TV subscribers can access their subscription by logging into the app.

Purchase NBA League Pass or NBA TV, and you will be automatically billed through Apple every 30 days (monthly packages) or every 365 days (annual packages) until you cancel your subscription. Refunds are not available after subscriptions have been activated.

Please visit support.watch.nba.com to contact the support team if you are experiencing any issues.

Privacy Policy: http://www.nba.com/news/privacy_policy.html

Between plays or during the break, place a bet in various markets for a shot to bring home big winnings. Crunch time. Anytime. 

Follow the action and bet live as the game unfolds.

All Customer offer ends 11/30/25 at 11:59 PM ET.

Ghost Leg: Opt-in required. 1 Ghost Leg Token per customer when offered. Must meet qualifying bet criteria. If only 1 leg of the bet loses, bet will settle as if only the winning legs were placed and pays out in cash based on odds when the bet was placed. Tokens expire at the start of the final game on when offered. Must select token BEFORE placing bet. Terms: sportsbook.draftkings.com/promos.

Predict Stats: Each player has a projected stat line. Choose “More” if you think they’ll exceed it, or “Less” if you think they’ll fall short. 

Track Picks & Win Big! Earn 1 point for each correct pick. Top scores split a prize pool. Build a perfect lineup to win up to 1000x your entry fee.

Stream and score your team’s games and keep fans connected to the action with GameChanger, the #1 youth sports app. All you need is a mobile device. Plus, coaches can access premium features, including stats and archived video for FREE!

EASY-TO-USE SCOREKEEPING TOOLS 
Ditch the paper scorebook with an intuitive FREE scorekeeping experience and get advanced scorekeeping tools and features for baseball, softball, basketball, soccer, lacrosse, football, hockey, field hockey, water polo, and rugby.

LIVE VIDEO STREAMING
Set up a live game stream in just three taps using a mobile device or external camera to bring the game to anyone, anywhere. A live scoreboard overlay keeps viewers updated in real time, so family and friends never have to miss a game!

AUTOSTREAM FOR BASKETBALL
Live stream basketball games easily with AutoStream, our proprietary AI-powered technology that delivers a hands-free full-court streaming experience for FREE. No complex setup required — all you need is a mobile device. 

FREE TEAM MANAGEMENT
Streamline team communication for 20+ sports with free in-app messaging, photo sharing, and event scheduling with RSVP and calendar sync.

ROSTER MANAGEMENT
Keep roster and team contact info all in one place. Automatically populate your entire team roster in seconds by importing from MaxPreps, Sports Connect, or a past season on GameChanger. 


TRACK BASEBALL & SOFTBALL STATS
Track 150+ basic and advanced baseball and softball stats, including pitch count, batting average, ERA, quality at-bats, and more. 

ADDITIONAL FEATURES:

EXCLUSIVE VIDEO
Streamed games are automatically stored in the video archive, and highlights from games that are streamed and scored are automatically clipped. Coaches and premium subscribers can access and review full game video and highlights at any time.

SHAREABLE ATHLETE PROFILES
Baseball, softball, and basketball players can showcase individual stats and key video highlights on customizable athlete profiles that can be shared with family, friends, or recruiters. (Paid subscription required for fans.)

PITCHING AND BATTING SPRAY CHARTS
Make informed game-time decisions with pitching and batting spray charts for baseball and softball.

PITCH COUNT TRACKING (Baseball only) 
Get relevant information to help monitor pitcher usage and keep players safe, with stats like pitch count, innings pitched, and innings caught. 

FREE FOR COACHES AND TEAM STAFF
GameChanger premium features like video highlights, video archives, career stats, and spray charts remain completely free for coaches and team staff. (Paid subscription required for fans.)

WEB PORTAL 
Manage team rosters, schedules, and review stats at our web portal at gc.com.

EXTERNAL CAMERA COMPATIBILITY
GameChanger is compatible with Mevo, GoPro, or other third-party cameras using RTMP.


GameChanger is currently available for the following sports: baseball, softball, soccer, basketball, lacrosse, football, volleyball, field hockey, ice hockey, water polo, rugby, swimming & diving, track & field, wrestling, crew & rowing, bowling, cheerleading, cross country, tennis, and golf teams.
